args.name: function_name
args.doc: Specifies a name of function to be created. The function name may be optionally qualified with a database name.

args.name: class_name
args.doc: Specifies the name of the class that provides the implementation for function to be created.

args.name: resource_locations
args.doc: Specifies the list of resources that contain the implementation of the function along with its dependencies.
